short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browse and download Instrumentals For Rap. Instrumentals for Rappers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Downloading Instrumentals just got easy! Fast download music from Chrisville Beats and with other your favorite audio resources.

The easiest extension to download music instrumentals from Chrisville Beats.

Instrumentals For Rap is a absolutely free application that powers up Chrome browser with the save instrumental files from Chrisville Beats music services. With our extension installed, anyone is able to save a high-quality music instrumental beats in one click and in just a few seconds.

The extension allows you to download any instrumental beat file from Chrisville Beats where you can play it.
